title: Multi-Voice-Based Online Math Learning Design: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of middle school-level basic math concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasizing smartphone-based accessibility and social learning opportunities, focusing on cultivating field-applicable mathematical problem-solving skills

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematics problems arising in real occupational contexts through multi-perspective collaborative approaches.
Learners can reconstruct learning content by sharing feedback with peers in mobile environments.
Learners can systematically document their mathematical thinking processes through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
